fields.description:
h3. Issue
Simple async tasks currently must be done the UI thread when there is AsyncTasks available specifically for background async tasks on Android.

h3. Solution
Provide access to the AsyncTask API via the Titanium SDK or a module.

h3. Reference
http://developer.android.com/reference/android/os/AsyncTask.html
fields.summary: Android: Provide access to Async Task API

comments.body: Large amounts of data are being downloaded (off main thread) and then parsed & processed (on main thread) which is causing unacceptable UI interruption.
